products.title: Hela | Cactus Leather Eco Trainer by Genesis | Black
products.description: • Mesh/mesh fabric made from recycled PET plastic bottles • Cactus based vegan leather • Recycled EVA foam insole • Cork sole from sustainable production • Laces made from recycled PET plastic bottles • Seams made from recycled PET plastic bottles • Lining in Abacá banana canvas and recycled cotton • Sole made from at least 40% natural rubber (unbleached) from Vietnam

products.title: 100% Natural Biodegradable & Recyclable Vegan Rubber Unisex Flip Flop | Dusky Pink
products.description: When you slip on a pair of our handcrafted 100% eco-friendly, ethically sourced natural Sri Lankan rubber flip flops, not only will they mould to the shape of your foot to provide exceptional comfort and support but you are also protecting our environment for future generations as all of our flip flops are 100% biodegradable and recyclable.
